framework

Interface ComponentReferences

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicBatch, BasicExternalInformationPort, BasicInputOutputHandler, BasicKeyGenerator, BasicMessageProcessor, BasicPool, BasicSystemTimeClock, BasicUserDatabase, Controller, ExternalInformationPortController, Implementation, InputOutputHandlerController, KeyGeneratorController, MessageProcessorController, Mix, NetworkClockController, OutputStrategyController, UserDatabaseController

    public interface ComponentReferences
    the interface ComponentReferences provides access to all the controllers, the logger and the settings class of a specific mix and to the mix itself
    Author:
    Daniel Kaiser
